com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.base

Class ODurableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.common.concur.resource.OSharedResourceAdaptive
      • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.impl.local.paginated.base.ODurableComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OClusterPositionMap, OHashTableDirectory, OLocalHashTable, OLocalHashTable20, OPaginatedCluster, OSBTree, OSBTreeBonsaiLocal

    public abstract class ODurableComponent
extends OSharedResourceAdaptive
    Base class for all durable data structures, that is data structures state of which can be consistently restored after system crash but results of last operations in small interval before crash may be lost. This class contains methods which are used to support such concepts as:
    1. "atomic operation" - set of operations which should be either applied together or not. It includes not only changes on current data structure but on all durable data structures which are used by current one during implementation of specific operation.
    2. write ahead log - log of all changes which were done with page content after loading it from cache.
    To support of "atomic operation" concept following should be done:
    1. Call startAtomicOperation(boolean) method.
    2. Call endAtomicOperation(boolean, Exception) method when atomic operation completes, passed in parameter should be false if atomic operation completes with success and true if there were some exceptions and it is needed to rollback given operation.
    Since:
    8/27/13
    Author:
    Andrey Lomakin
